name: MAU - UW Stout GDD-200
description:
The world is dark. The air is hot and dry. The ground is sandy. For the first time in centuries, you open your eyes, inhale the musty atmosphere, and release a mighty… “MAU!”

You are a mummified cat buried in an ancient Egyptian tomb. In order to weigh yourself against the Feather of Truth and successfully move on to the afterlife, you must collect your eight missing hearts while traversing traps, puzzles, and enemies! Complete the final level with all nine hearts to win!
